title: Did US Capitol Police Officer Take a Selfie With Rioter?
subtitle: A known white nationalist recorded the clip that went viral amid the chaos of the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: A U.S. Capitol Police officer posed for a photograph with a member of the pro-Trump mob that stormed the federal building on Jan. 6, 2021.
